findings.message: Caching the array length outside a loop saves reading it on each iteration, as long as the array's length is not changed during the loop.
findings.name: array-length-outside-loop

findings.message: Replace state variable reads and writes within loops with local variable reads and writes.
findings.name: state-variable-read-in-a-loop

findings.message: Replace state variable reads and writes within loops with local variable reads and writes.
findings.name: state-variable-read-in-a-loop

findings.message: Using nested is cheaper than using && multiple check combinations. There are more advantages, such as easier to read code and better coverage reports.
findings.name: use-nested-if

findings.message: Consider using the prefix decrement expression whenever the return value is not needed. The prefix decrement expression is cheaper in terms of gas.
findings.name: use-prefix-decrement-not-postfix

findings.message: Consider using the prefix increment expression whenever the return value is not needed. The prefix increment expression is cheaper in terms of gas.
findings.name: use-prefix-increment-not-postfix
